body_html:
Hi again, I found a way to do it without compiling from scratch each time.

I was basically modifying the files in aten/src, and the command:

  -  python setup.py build_caffe2

was enough to apply the changes to required libraries . It saves me around 40 minutes every time when I have to compile again for testing.

I hope my answer works for you, cuz it worked for me!

body:
Hi again, I found a way to do it without compiling from scratch each time.

I was basically modifying the files in aten/src, and the command:

      -  python setup.py build_caffe2

was enough to apply the changes to required libraries . It saves me around 40 minutes every time when I have to compile again for testing.

I hope my answer works for you, cuz it worked for me!
